alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 1:09PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pushmataha and southwestern Latimer Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 108 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Clayton to 2 miles north of Dunbar. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Clayton... Dunbar... Stanley... Yanush... Sardis... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
